triples.name: Reachability analysis
triples.relevance: The core problem being analyzed and reviewed in the paper.

triples.name: Set propagation
triples.relevance: The main technique reviewed for computing reachable sets.

triples.name: Dynamical system
triples.relevance: The type of system for which reachability is being analyzed.

triples.name: Hybrid system
triples.relevance: One class of systems addressed in the reachability analysis techniques.

triples.name: Linear system
triples.relevance: One class of systems for which reachability analysis techniques are presented.

triples.name: Nonlinear system
triples.relevance: One class of systems for which reachability analysis techniques are presented.

triples.name: Formal verification
triples.relevance: A key application domain for reachability analysis mentioned in the abstract.

triples.name: Control theory
triples.relevance: The theoretical foundation for controller synthesis applications of reachability analysis.

triples.name: Estimation theory
triples.relevance: One application area for reachability analysis techniques.
